https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8ueyHo4itWKCOS8JmMbllQNvY79.jpg BREAKING POINT: The War for Democracy in Ukraine looks at people transformed by a democratic revolution, who give up their normal lives to fight a Russian invasion, in a war which has killed 10,000 and displaced 1.9 million Ukrainians. Breaking Point: The War for Democracy in Ukraine
